CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
;adv=10; This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1972 Code, as supplemented through September 18, 1978, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1972 Code. This table contains some ordinances which precede September 18, 1978, but which were never included in the 1972 Code, as supplemented, for various reasons. Ordinances not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND
Ordinance
Number Adoption
Date Section Section
this Code
